___name.description: Name of the IHEC Data Hub, as it should appear on a list or directory.

___taxon_id.description: Taxonomy ID, as can be found on NCBI resources. (e.g. '9606' for human)

___description.description: A description of the hub content.

___email.description: Write-to address for enquiries about the data hub.

___assembly.description: Assembly version as it can be found on the UCSC Genome Browser site. (e.g. hg19, hg38, mm10)

___description_url.description: A link to an HTML document describing of the hub content, or its connected project.

___date.description: Data hub release date, in ISO 8601 format.

___publishing_group.description: The consortia, project or lab publishing this data hub.
